pages.title: WalkAway Blocks
pages.text: $(br)Just a decorative block to support for Convoyor Belt.$(br) Also you can right click with an iron $(l:bedrockutils:misc/itemplate_entry)plate$() to make Covered Walk Away.$(br) Sneak + Right click with $(l:bedrockutils:tools/hammerplate_entry)Hammer Plate$() to remove it.
